GS40vrasrscu:4555: navotpannataṇḍulīyamūlaiḥ yadvā vālaḥ aśvapucchakeśaḥ tathā abdadhvanimūlaṃ taiḥ liptā ityanenānvayaḥ * draveṇa vyādhitā viddhā spṛṣṭā ityarthaḥ dravapūrṇā ityāśayaḥ //

GS40vrasrscu:4706_1: ca cullyākāramekaṃ mārttikaṃ yantraṃ kṛtvā tasya ekabhittau vitastivistaraṃ dvāraṃ

GS40vrasrscu:4715: * tathā caturasrā catuṣkoṇā sarvato dārḍhyāya mṛnmayena kuḍyena bhittyā bahirveṣṭitā kāryā * tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catasro bhittayaḥ sambhavanti // VRrsṬī_10.38;5
GS40vrasrscu:4716: * ekabhittāviti sāmānyata uktamapi yogyatayā pūrvabhittau paścimabhittau veti viśeṣārthe paryavasyati // VRrsṬī_10.38;6
GS40vrasrscu:4717: * tasyāṃ diśi sthitāyāṃ bhittau dvāraṃ vitastyā saṃmitaṃ kāryam //

GS40vrasrscu:4722: * sa tu prācyāṃ pratīcyāṃ vādhikyena labhyata iti prakāśayogyatvād viśiṣṭā digevātra gṛhītā // VRrsṬī_10.38;11
GS40vrasrscu:4723: * taddvārasyādhobhāgo dehalī dvāradehasaṃrakṣikā sā dvitryaṅgulamitā kāryā // VRrsṬī_10.38;12
GS40vrasrscu:4724: * tādṛgdehalyā adhobhāge bhūtalaṃ saṃlagnaṃ pūrvavadeva sārdhavitastimitasūtreṇa paricchinnam arthāt ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ vartulaṃ dvāraṃ

GS40vrasrscu:4728: * ata uktaṃ sūtramitaṃ vartulaṃ ceti // VRrsṬī_10.38;15
GS40vrasrscu:4730: sārdhavitastimānārthaṃ saṃgrāhya iti noktasūtradairghyamānāpekṣā lohakārāṇāṃ tathaiva saṃpradāyo'pi saṃprati dhmānavidhau dṛśyata iti vadanti // VRrsṬī_10.38;16
GS40vrasrscu:4733: * ūrdhvabhāge koṣṭhikāyā uttarāṅgasyordhvāṅgasya ca kartavyā yā
GS40vrasrscu:4734: bhittiḥ sā caturvidhāpi prādeśapramitā daśāṅgulamitaivārthācchikhākāravat saṃkucitā kāryā * śikhāsthāna ūrdhvaṃ dvāraṃ tu prādeśamitāyāmavistāram eva kāryam //
GS40vrasrscu:4735: * tatastaddvāraṃ ceṣṭikayā ruddhvā prāguktavitastimitaṃ dvāraṃ ca
GS40vrasrscu:4737: * kiṃ kṛtvā ruddhvā dhamettadāha prathamaṃ śikhitrān kokilān dhmānārham abhrakādidravaṃ cordhvadvāreṇa krameṇa nikṣipet //
GS40vrasrscu:4738: * kiṃ tad dhmānadravyaṃ piṇḍīkṛtaṃ bhāgaśaḥ sakṛdeva vā nikṣiped ityākāṅkṣāyāmāha sattvapātanagolān iti // VRrsṬī_10.38;23
GS40vrasrscu:4739: * punaḥ punaḥ pratiprakṣepakālāvasaraṃ saṃtataṃ dhmātvā yadāṅgārāḥ
GS40vrasrscu:4740: kārśyaṃ prāpnuyuḥ śvetabhasmāvṛtāśca bhaveyustadā punaḥ kokilān dattvā punardhamanaṃ kāryam * evaṃ bhastrādvayena praharaparyantaṃ saṃtataṃ dhmānena prāyaḥ
GS40vrasrscu:4742: * paraṃ tu nāyaṃ kālaḥ sattvanirgamanajñāpakaḥ svātantreṇa kiṃtu śuklā vahnijvālaiva jñāyamānā // VRrsṬī_10.38;26
GS40vrasrscu:4747: * tadā sphuṭipiṇḍīr bahir niṣkāsya kiṭṭaṃ pṛthakkṛtya gurumārgeṇa sattvamātraṃ grāhyam * atha dvitīyaḥ sattvapiṇḍānāṃ prakṣepakālaḥ prāpnotīti bodhyam //

GS40vrasrscu:4762: * tataḥ abhyantaragartamadhye pañcarandhrasaṃyuktāṃ mṛccakrīṃ sthāpayitvā aṅgāraiḥ koṣṭhīṃ paripūrya ca ekabhastrayā pradhamet //
GS40vrasrscu:4763: * mṛdudravyāṇāṃ sattvapātanārtham iyaṃ pātālakoṣṭhīti jñeyamiti niṣkarṣaḥ // VRrsBo_10.42;4

GS40vrasrscu:4767_0: ārabhya pṛṣṭhabhāgaparyantaṃ bāhyagartābhimukhaṃ tatsallagnaṃ kiṃcitsamunnataṃ tiryaṅnālasamanvitaṃ
GS40vrasrscu:4767_1: dvāraṃ vidhāya garbhagartopari mṛccakrīṃ pañcarandhraviśiṣṭāṃ vāyor ūrdhvagamanārthaṃ
GS40vrasrscu:4767_2: kṣipet * taduparyaṅgārāṃstadupari sattvapātanagolāṃśca nikṣipya sarvāṃ koṣṭhīṃ kokilaiḥ

GS40vrasrscu:4782: * iyaṃ kāṃsyarītipramukhaṃ yatsṛṣṭalohaṃ tanmadhye saṃsargaghaṭakayor madhya ekasyāvaśeṣakarī dvitīyaṃ vināśyetyarthaḥ // VRrsṬī_10.44;5
GS40vrasrscu:4785_0: * dvādaśāṅgulagabhīrā prādeśapramāṇavistāraviśiṣṭā koṣṭhī ekā kāryā tasyā ūrdhvaṃ
GS40vrasrscu:4785_1: caturaṅgule valayākāram ālavālam ekaṃ dattvā tadupari bahucchidrāṃ cakrīṃ nidhāya
GS40vrasrscu:4785_2: aṅgāraṃ nikṣipya ca vaṅkanālena pradhamet iti

GS40vrasrscu:4790: vaṅkanālam idaṃ proktaṃ dṛḍhadhmānāya kīrtitam // VRrs_10.45 //

GS40vrasrscu:4794_0: * śarkarādīnām anyatamābhiḥ mūṣopayogimṛdbhiḥ aratnipramitaṃ dṛḍhaṃ nālaṃ kṛtvā tanmukhe
GS40vrasrscu:4794_1: pañcāṅgulapramāṇam adhomukhaṃ nālam ekaṃ yojayet dṛḍhadhmānāya tad vaṅkanālaṃ veditavyam
GS40vrasrscu:4799: * atha siddharasānāṃ khoṭabaddhādīnām abhrakādisattvānāṃ ca kācaṭaṅkaṇasauvīrādinā śodhayituṃ sādhanabhūtāṃ koṣṭhīmāha dvādaśāṅguleti // VRrsṬī_10.46;1
GS40vrasrscu:4800: * asyāṃ koṣṭhyāṃ sthāpitamūṣāmadhye siddharasādi prakṣipya saṃtatadhmānāvasare 'ntarāntarā muhuḥ kācacūrṇādi dattvā dhamet //
GS40vrasrscu:4802: * iyaṃ koṣṭhī budhnabhāgamārabhya mukhabhāgaparyantaṃ kramavistṛtā prādeśapramitavartulamukhī kāryetyanuktamapi bodhyam // VRrsṬī_10.46;4
GS40vrasrscu:4806: neṣṭo nyūnādhikaḥ pākaḥ supākaṃ hitam auṣadham // VRrs_10.47 //
GS40vrasrscu:4808: anapsu majjanaṃ rekhāpūrṇatā puṭato bhavet // VRrs_10.48 //
GS40vrasrscu:4809: puṭād grāvṇo laghutvaṃ ca śīghravyāptiśca dīpanam /
GS40vrasrscu:4814: * saṃprati mūṣākoṣṭhyapekṣyādhikatarāgnijanakapuṭān vaktuṃ teṣāṃ prayojanamāha raseti * rasalohaprabhṛtikaṭhoradravyāṇāṃ samyakpāko bheṣajārthamapekṣyate //
GS40vrasrscu:4815: * sa ca pākaḥ kriyārūpastulayā parimāṇena vā paricchettuṃ na śakyate
GS40vrasrscu:4821: * adhipākena tu dravyaṃ niḥsāraṃ dagdhaṃ bhavatyodanavat //
GS40vrasrscu:4822: * atha puṭasya yogato guṇāṃllohasthān āha lohāderiti // VRrsṬī_10.50;9
GS40vrasrscu:4824: * guṇādhikyamāmāvasthāpanne tasmin bhakṣite jāṭharāgnyapākena rogavārakā guṇāstathā puṣṭyādayo mārdavādayaścānudbhūtāsteṣām udbhavenādhikyābhāsaḥ // VRrsṬī_10.50;11

GS40vrasrscu:6704: itthaṃ siddho rasaḥ so'yaṃ grahaṇīgajakesarī // VRrs_16.74 //
GS40vrasrscu:6706: vallena pramitaścāyaṃ rasaḥ śuṇṭhyā ghṛtāktayā // VRrs_16.75 //
GS40vrasrscu:6707: sevito grahaṇīṃ hanti satsaṅga iva vigraham /
GS40vrasrscu:6709: hitaṃ mitaṃ ca viśadaṃ laghu grāhi rucipradam /
GS40vrasrscu:6712: badhnannapi malaṃ śīghraṃ nādhmānaṃ kurute nṛṇām // VRrs_16.78 //
GS40vrasrscu:6714: pāradaṃ gandhakaṃ vyoma tīkṣṇaṃ tālaṃ manaḥśilā /
GS40vrasrscu:6715: sauvīramañjanaṃ śuddhaṃ vimalaṃ ca samāṃśakam // VRrs_16.79 //
GS40vrasrscu:6717: granthikaṃ jīrakaṃ citraṃ dīpyakaṃ mustakaṃ viṣam // VRrs_16.80 //
GS40vrasrscu:6723: proktena kramayogena raso niṣpadyate hyayam // VRrs_16.83 //
GS40vrasrscu:6724: jagdho viśvaghanāmbunā sa hi rasaḥ śīghraprabhāvābhidho niṣkārdhapramito
GS40vrasrscu:6726: ādhmāne grahaṇībhave rucihate vāte ca mandānale mukte cāpi male punaścalamalāśaṅkāsu hikkāsu ca // VRrs_16.84 //
GS40vrasrscu:6728: kapardatulyaṃ rasagandhakalkaṃ lohaṃ mṛtaṃ ṭaṅkaṇakaṃ ca tulyam /
GS40vrasrscu:6729: jayārasenaikadinaṃ vimardya cūrṇena sampiṣya puṭettu bhāṇḍe // VRrs_16.85
GS40vrasrscu:6730: dadīta tāṃ poṭalikāṃ ca doṣatrayapradhānagrahaṇīnivṛttyai // VRrs_16.86 //
GS40vrasrscu:6734: śodhitaṃ saptadhā caiva dvimāṣaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ pṛthak /
GS40vrasrscu:6737: kariṇī karṇamoṭī ca rudaṃtī citrakārdrakāt // VRrs_16.89 //
GS40vrasrscu:6745: apāmārgasya ca kṣāraṃ lavaṇaṃ dvidvimāṣakam // VRrs_16.92 //
GS40vrasrscu:6747: bhakṣayitvā tato guñjāṃ grahaṇyāṃ kāṃjikaṃ pibet // VRrs_16.93 //
GS40vrasrscu:6748: paktiśūle ca kāse ca mandāgnāv ārdrakadravam /
GS40vrasrscu:6749: amlapitte ca dhāroṣṇaṃ kṣīraṃ vajradharo hyayam // VRrs_16.94 //
GS40vrasrscu:6752: jayā ca jaṃbīrarasena piṣṭaṃ piṇḍīkṛtaṃ syādgrahaṇīkapāṭaḥ // VRrs_16.95
GS40vrasrscu:6757: kapitthasāreṇa samaṃ pragṛhya dadīta cūrṇaṃ niśi tīvrapittaiḥ //
GS40vrasrscu:6759: vātapradhāne ca kaphapradhāne rātrau kaṣāyaṃ kuṭajasya dadyāt //
GS40vrasrscu:6764: pibeduṣṇāṃbhasā cānu vātotthāṃ grahaṇīṃ jayet // VRrs_16.100 //
GS40vrasrscu:6770: vireko jaṭhare śūlaṃ vamanaṃ ca muhurmuhuḥ /
GS40vrasrscu:6781: toyaiḥ phalānāmatha siddhasūto vidhvaṃsanāmā śamano viṣūcyāḥ //
GS40vrasrscu:6782: amuṣya guñjā nava dāpanīyā hantuṃ viṣūcīṃ sitayā sametāḥ /
GS40vrasrscu:6783: takraudanaṃ syādiha bhojanāya pathyaṃ ca śākaṃ kila vāstukasya //
GS40vrasrscu:6795: ṭaṃkaṇaṃ maricaṃ tutthaṃ pṛthak karṣatrayaṃ bhavet /
GS40vrasrscu:6796: sundaraṃ dvādaśaṃ niṣkaṃ triṃśanniṣkam ayomalam // VRrs_16.113 //
GS40vrasrscu:6804: śuddhau sūtabalī carācararajaḥ karṣāṃśataḥ kajjalīm kṛtvā gopayasā vimardya divasaṃ ruddhvā ca mūṣodare /
GS40vrasrscu:6805: siddhaṃ kumbhapuṭe svataśca śiśirā piṣṭā karaṇḍe sthitā syād vaiśvānarapoṭalīti kathitā tīvrāgnidīptipradā ekonaviṃśateścūrṇairmaricānāṃ ghṛtānvitaiḥ /
GS40vrasrscu:6810: rātrau ca payasā sārdhaṃ yadvā rogānusārataḥ // VRrs_16.120 //
GS40vrasrscu:6812: bilvaṃ ca kāravellaṃ ca vṛṃtākaṃ kāṃjikaṃ tyajet // VRrs_16.121 //
GS40vrasrscu:6813: iyaṃ hi poṭalī proktā siṅghaṇena mahībhṛtā /
GS40vrasrscu:6817: poṭalyo dīpanāḥ snigdhā maṃdāgnau nitarāṃ hitāḥ // VRrs_16.123 //
GS40vrasrscu:6819: carācareti sā proktā varāṭī naṃdinā khalu // VRrs_16.124 //
GS40vrasrscu:6823: dattvā dattvā guṇānbhūyo vikārānkurvate hi te // VRrs_16.126 //
GS40vrasrscu:6826: bhṛṅgāmbhoviṣatindukārdrakarasaiḥ sampiṣya guṃjāmitā saṃśuṣkā vaḍavāmukhīti guṭikā nāmnoditā tārayā // VRrs_16.127 //
GS40vrasrscu:6827_0: kṣipraṃ kṣutparibodhinī khalu matā sarvāmayadhvaṃsinī śleṣmavyādhividhūnanī kasanahṛcchvāsāpahā
GS40vrasrscu:6827_1: śūlanut kṣudvaiṣamyaharā ca gulmaśamanī mūlārtimūlaṃkaṣā śophavyādhiharātra kiṃ bahugirā
GS40vrasrscu:6840: tataḥ saṃśoṣya sampiṣya kūpikājaṭhare kṣipet // VRrs_16.134 //
GS40vrasrscu:6842: bhuktvā ca kaṃṭhaparyantaṃ caturvallamitaṃ rasam // VRrs_16.135 //
GS40vrasrscu:6844: kṣipraṃ tajjīryate bhuktaṃ jāyate dīpanaṃ punaḥ // VRrs_16.136 //
GS40vrasrscu:6848: kuryāddīpanamuddhataṃ ca pacanaṃ duṣṭāmasaṃśoṣaṇaṃ tundasthaulyanibarhaṇaṃ garaharaṃ mūlārtiśūlāpaham
GS40vrasrscu:6849: gulmaplīhavināśanaṃ grahaṇikāvidhvaṃsanaṃ sraṃsanaṃ vātagranthimahodarāpaharaṇaṃ kravyādanāmā rasaḥ // VRrs_16.138 //
GS40vrasrscu:6852: rasatulyaṃ śivācūrṇaṃ gandhakaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ tathā // VRrs_16.139 //
GS40vrasrscu:6857: pāṇḍuvyādhimahodarārtiśamanī śūlāntakṛt pācinī śophaghnī pavanārtināśanapaṭuḥ śleṣmāmayadhvaṃsinī [agnikumārarasaḥ]
GS40vrasrscu:6858: śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ viṣaṃ gaṃdhaṃ dvikṣāraṃ paṭupañcakam /
GS40vrasrscu:6859: daśakaṃ tulyāṃśaṃ bharjitā vijayā navā // VRrs_16.142 //
GS40vrasrscu:6862: drāvair dinatrayaṃ mardyaṃ ruddhvā bhāṇḍe pacellaghu /
GS40vrasrscu:6863: dīpāgninā tu yāmaikaṃ śuṣkaṃ yāvatsamuddharet // VRrs_16.144 //
GS40vrasrscu:6866: pratikarṣaṃ guḍaṃ śuṃṭhī hyanupānaṃ ca dīpanam // VRrs_16.145 //
GS40vrasrscu:6872: tāmraṃ pāradagaṃdhakau trikaṭukaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca sauvarcalaṃ khalle mardya dṛḍhaṃ vidhāya sikatākumbhe'ṣṭayāmaṃ tataḥ /
GS40vrasrscu:6873: svinnaṃ tasya ca raktaśākinibhavaṃ kṣāraṃ samaṃ melayet sarvaṃ bhāvitamātuluṃgajarasairnāmnā raso rākṣasaḥ // VRrs_16.147 //
GS40vrasrscu:6874: mandāgnau satataṃ dadīta munaye prātaḥ purā śaṃkaraḥ sakhya asmai cyavanāya maṃdahutabhugvaryāya naṣṭaujase /
GS40vrasrscu:6875: tenādāya samastalokagurave sūryāya tasmai namo martyānāmapi cāsya dānasamaye guṃjāṣṭakaṃ varjayet [jīvanāmā rasaḥ]
GS40vrasrscu:6877: kramaśa uttaraṃ ca vicūrṇitayā bṛhatīrasasaṃyutabhāvanayā // VRrs_16.149
GS40vrasrscu:6879: tatra kalāṃśaviśaṃ ca vimiśraṃ tadrasamānaṃ mānavidhayā // VRrs_16.150 //
GS40vrasrscu:6883: śulbaṃ tālakagandhakau jalanidheḥ pheno 'gnigarbhāśayaḥ kāntāyo lavaṇāni hemapavayo nīlāṃjanaṃ tutthakam /
GS40vrasrscu:6884: bhāgo dvādaśako rasasya tu dinaṃ vallyaṃbughṛṣṭaṃ śanaiḥ siddho'yaṃ
GS40vrasrscu:6895: pathyā śuṇṭhī guḍaṃ cānu palārdhaṃ bhakṣayetsadā // VRrs_16.156 //
GS40vrasrscu:6901: yatheṣṭaṃ ghṛtamāṃsāśī śakto bhavati pāvakaḥ // VRrs_16.159 //
GS40vrasrscu:6904: kaṭau kukṣipradeśe ca śūlaṃ prathamato bhavet /
GS40vrasrscu:6908: vasuḥ punarnavā vāsā śvetā grāhyā prayatnataḥ // VRrs_17.2 //
GS40vrasrscu:6916: ghṛṣṭaṃ pacecca mūṣāyāṃ dvau māṣau tasya bhakṣayet // VRrs_17.5 //
GS40vrasrscu:6924: tattāmraṃ śuddhasūtaṃ ca gaṃdhakaṃ ca samaṃ samam // VRrs_17.8 //
GS40vrasrscu:6926: yāmaikaṃ vālukāyaṃtre pācyaṃ yojyaṃ dviguñjakam // VRrs_17.9 //
GS40vrasrscu:6936: madhunā ca yavakṣāraṃ līḍhaṃ syād aśmarīharam // VRrs_17.14 //
GS40vrasrscu:6939: aśmarīṃ hanti no citraṃ karṣamātraṃ śivoditam // VRrs_17.16 //
GS40vrasrscu:6947: piṣṭvā varāṭakaṃ tena rasapādaṃ ca ṭaṃkaṇam // VRrs_17.19 //
GS40vrasrscu:6952: śarkarābhāvitaṃ cānu pītvā kṛcchraharaṃ param // VRrs_17.21 //
GS40vrasrscu:6956: raktena ca pṛthagdoṣaiḥ samastaiḥ pañcadhā bhavet /
GS40vrasrscu:6962: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ tāpyasattvaṃ ca vaikṛtam /
GS40vrasrscu:6966: kācakūpyāṃ tataḥ kṣiptvā tāmrapātraṃ mukhe nyaset /
GS40vrasrscu:6968: viśoṣya ca puṭaṃ dadyādbhūmau nikṣipya kūpikām /
GS40vrasrscu:6973: sevito guñjayā tulyaḥ sitayā ca rasottamaḥ // VRrs_18.10 //
GS40vrasrscu:6976: gavyājyena ca saṃsādhya tattadānīṃ hi bhojayet /
GS40vrasrscu:6983: vajraṃ marakataṃ padmarāgaṃ puṣpaṃ ca nīlakam /
GS40vrasrscu:6984: vaidūryaṃ cātha gomedaṃ mauktikaṃ vidrumaṃ tathā // VRrs_18.15 //
GS40vrasrscu:6988: tattulyaṃ tāpyajaṃ bhasma tadvadvimalabhasma ca // VRrs_18.17 //
GS40vrasrscu:6997: so'yaṃ pācanadīpano rucikaro vṛṣyastathā garbhiṇīsarvavyādhivināśano ratikaraḥ pāṇḍupracaṇḍārtinut
GS40vrasrscu:6998: dhanyo buddhikaraśca putrajananaḥ saubhāgyakṛdyoṣitāṃ nirdoṣaḥ smaramandirāmayaharo yogādaśeṣārtinut [cakribandharasa]
GS40vrasrscu:7002: dvipalasya ca tāmrasya tanmukhe cakrikāṃ nyaset // VRrs_18.24 //
GS40vrasrscu:7004: tataḥ karipuṭārdhena pākaṃ samyak prakalpayet // VRrs_18.25 //
GS40vrasrscu:7008: dātavyaḥ śūlarogeṣu mūle gulme bhagandare // VRrs_18.27 //
